item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mash Costume Crisis
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar try to figure out Mashramani costumes on a budget of exactly zero dollars. Wilar has a plan. Speedeet has doubts. Miss Sharma’s clothesline has feathers.
